titleStmt.title: Ayres and dialogues, for one, two, and three voyces by Henry Lawes ... ; the first [-thirde] booke.
Ayres and dialogues
titleStmt.author: Lawes, Henry, 1596-1662.
Playford, John, 1623-1686?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. H. for John Playford ...,

notesStmt.note: Each part has a special t.p. Book II, The second book of ayres, and dialogues, ... 1655.
Reissued in 1669 with cancel t.p. beginning: "Select ayres and dialogues", as the third book of John Playford's Treasury of musick.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries and Huntington Library.

Book III appears at reel 461:33 as part of Wing L638, at reel 461:35 as Wing L644 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.), at reel 500:11 incorrectly identified as Wing L642, and at reel 1724:12 as Wing L639.
